name: Resource & Support Centre for Development
briefDescription: Resource and Support Centre for Development (RSCD) is a people centered, effective and articulate organization that aims at enhancing the role of developmental partners for creating an egalitarian, interdependent and humane society.RSCD firmly supports the belief and optimism that only collective strength can break the cycle of oppression of the marginalized section of the society. It believes in the value of Leadership and Governance of and for the poor and the marginalized, especially strengthening the role of the elected women representatives in local bodies of the state.
